name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Force be Vid-eo | Control Video Remotely

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension when enabled on a tab playing a video, allows you to control the video from your mobile phone (no separate app required.). Just scan the QR code shown in the extension when it's enabled and control the video from your smartphone. 

May the force be vid-eo ⚔️
